recipesJson.name: Green-Broke Pony
recipesJson.author: coilspotting
recipesJson.description:
A close relative of My Pony, but with stronger "green" notes of lime and pear. A wilder flavor, hence "green-broke", as they say in the horsey world. 

Please read my Notes below. Thanks for checking it out!

reviews.text: Holy shit... That's 18 flavors. I'd really appreciate some notes so I could understand your reasoning behind using all of these. Pretty sure POA uses no more than 6 flavors and it 90/10 pg/VG so unless they are using VG flavorings(doubtful) it roughly 10% flavoring
